meanings.definition: A unit of computing speed equal to one trillion floating-point operations per second.
meanings.sent1: My new computer can process data at incredible speeds, measuring in teraflops.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use teraflops to measure the performance of supercomputers.
meanings.sent3: The race car driver joked that his brain operates at a million teraflops during a race.
meanings.sent4: Her mind raced at teraflops, coming up with creative solutions in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The image processing software can handle images with teraflops of speed, making editing a breeze.
